data.text:
Everyone thought that Grass Wonder was rejecting 
scouts because of a lack of competitiveness.
data.processed:
󠁿Everyone thought that Grass Wonder was rejecting 
󠁿scouts because of a lack of competitiveness.

data.text:
But after watching her during training the day before, 
it didn't seem like she was such an unassertive girl.
data.processed:
󠁿But after watching her during training the day before, 
󠁿it didn't seem like she was such an unassertive girl.

data.text: ――I want to know her true self.
data.processed: 󠁿――I want to know her true self.

data.text:
Oh…… good evening. 
To be out here at this hour, is something the matter～?
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: I was going to ask you that
I was going to ask you that

data.processed:
󠁿Oh…… good evening. 
󠁿To be out here at this hour, is something the matter～?

data.text: Eh?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿Eh?

data.text:
Well…… that's right, when I was looking at the night sky, 
I decided to take it easy～. Fufufu, I probably shouldn't though.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Well…… that's right, when I was looking at the night sky, 
󠁿I decided to take it easy～. Fufufu, I probably shouldn't though.

data.text:
But, I plan on heading back to the dorms soon. 
……did you have any other business with me? Well then, I'll be――
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: You really don't plan to be scouted?
You really don't plan to be scouted?

data.processed:
󠁿But, I plan on heading back to the dorms soon. 
󠁿……did you have any other business with me? Well then, I'll be――

data.text:
Oh my…… regarding that, 
I thought I had already rejected that before……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Oh my…… regarding that, 
󠁿I thought I had already rejected that before……

data.text:
Unfortunately, my feelings haven't changed from then. 
I'm sorry.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Unfortunately, my feelings haven't changed from then. 
󠁿I'm sorry.

data.text:
Hmmmmm～…… I'm sorry, 
all I can say about that is…… it's my own personal problem.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Hmmmmm～…… I'm sorry, 
󠁿all I can say about that is…… it's my own personal problem.

data.text:
I hadn't heard it directly from her mouth, 
but I think I had an idea of what it was.
data.processed:
󠁿I hadn't heard it directly from her mouth, 
󠁿but I think I had an idea of what it was.

data.text:
On the training course the other day, her eyes. 
The hidden feelings behind those determined blue eyes――

choices.text: Are you frustrated that you got second?
choices.processed: <size=41>Are you frustrated that you got second?</size>

choices.text: Are you frustrated that you got second?
choices.processed: <size=41>Are you frustrated that you got second?</size>

data.processed:
󠁿On the training course the other day, her eyes. 
󠁿The hidden feelings behind those determined blue eyes――

data.text: ……Oh.
data.name: Grass Wonder

data.text: What makes you think that?
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: I could see the fire in your eyes
I could see the fire in your eyes

data.processed: 󠁿What makes you think that?

data.text: My eyes……?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿My eyes……?

data.text: From just…… my eyes, you could tell?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿From just…… my eyes, you could tell?

data.text:
……A Yamato Nadeshiko should always be modest. 
With a soft demeanor, and calm bearing. Never wavering, solemn.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿……A Yamato Nadeshiko should always be modest. 
󠁿With a soft demeanor, and calm bearing. Never wavering, solemn.

data.text: That's what I had decided in my heart, but――
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿That's what I had decided in my heart, but――

data.text:
『Remain calm in the face of adversity』. I can't help but be 
frustrated at my own weakness, and I can't erase this feeling.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿『Remain calm in the face of adversity』. I can't help but be 
󠁿frustrated at my own weakness, and I can't erase this feeling.

data.text:
I started running by my own will. The path I've chosen 
lays atop the turf. Until I reach the summit, I will not stop.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿I started running by my own will. The path I've chosen 
󠁿lays atop the turf. Until I reach the summit, I will not stop.

data.text:
That being the case…… no matter the reason, 
I should not yield victory. ……no matter what happens.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿That being the case…… no matter the reason, 
󠁿I should not yield victory. ……no matter what happens.

data.text: And yet……!
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: You can't forgive yourself for losing?

data.processed: 󠁿And yet……!

data.text: ……Yes.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿……Yes.

data.text:
The moment you start to concede, the path to the top is closed. 
It won't do to accept a scout with these half-hearted emotions.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿The moment you start to concede, the path to the top is closed. 
󠁿It won't do to accept a scout with these half-hearted emotions.

data.text:
……To put it another way, it's my own selfishness. 
A personal conviction.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿……To put it another way, it's my own selfishness. 
󠁿A personal conviction.

data.text: I apologize, but you'll just have to let it go――
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: Then I'll ask again when you win
Then I'll ask again when you win

data.processed: 󠁿I apologize, but you'll just have to let it go――

data.text: ……Eh?
data.name: Grass Wonder

data.text:
By again…… um, perhaps, 
do you mean you'll come and try to scout me again?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿By again…… um, perhaps, 
󠁿do you mean you'll come and try to scout me again?

data.text:
A couple months from now, when I enter another 
Selection Race, you'll wait until then……?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿A couple months from now, when I enter another 
󠁿Selection Race, you'll wait until then……?

data.text: Um…… well.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿Um…… well.

data.text:
I don't know what to say…… 
I'm not an easy Uma Musume to deal with, you know?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿I don't know what to say…… 
󠁿I'm not an easy Uma Musume to deal with, you know?

data.text:
The things I can't yield, I won't yield. 
Once I decide on something, I won't change my mind.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿The things I can't yield, I won't yield. 
󠁿Once I decide on something, I won't change my mind.

data.text:
I was uneasy with the results, that's the only reason I've been 
refusing scouts, just so I could enter another Selection Race.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿I was uneasy with the results, that's the only reason I've been 
󠁿refusing scouts, just so I could enter another Selection Race.

data.text:
……even knowing that, will you still say that? 
『I will wait』?
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: I want to support you in your endeavor
choices.processed: <size=42>I want to support you in your endeavor</size>

choices.text: I want to support you in your endeavor
choices.processed: <size=42>I want to support you in your endeavor</size>

data.processed:
󠁿……even knowing that, will you still say that? 
󠁿『I will wait』?

data.text: Trainer-san……
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿Trainer-san……

data.text:
……Fufu. Are you okay with that? If I don't 
place first in a Selection Race, it means you 
won't be in charge of anyone, you know?
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: You'll definitely win next time, though?
You'll definitely win next time, though?

data.processed:
󠁿……Fufu. Are you okay with that? If I don't 
󠁿place first in a Selection Race, it means you 
󠁿won't be in charge of anyone, you know?

data.text:
Oh my～. 
If you say something like that…… Fufufuu.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Oh my～. 
󠁿If you say something like that…… Fufufuu.

data.text:
……Trainer-san, you're quite good at 
getting me to go along, aren't you?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿……Trainer-san, you're quite good at 
󠁿getting me to go along, aren't you?

data.text: And then, several months later――
data.processed: 󠁿And then, several months later――

data.text:
―Surging forward, it's Grass Wonder! 
She passes the leaders with ease and moves in to 1st!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
󠁿―Surging forward, it's Grass Wonder! 
󠁿She passes the leaders with ease and moves in to 1st!

data.text:
She's pulling away! She's pulling away! What a strong finish! 
She's pulling away―― Grass Wonder, crosses the gooooooal!!
data.name: Announcer
data.processed:
󠁿She's pulling away! She's pulling away! What a strong finish! 
󠁿She's pulling away―― Grass Wonder, crosses the gooooooal!!

data.text: With her strong will, Grass Wonder was magnificent.
data.processed: 󠁿With her strong will, Grass Wonder was magnificent.

data.text: And then――
data.processed: 󠁿And then――

data.text: You got first, huh, Grass!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: 󠁿You got first, huh, Grass!

data.text: Oh, even I was surprised～
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿Oh, even I was surprised～

data.text: What a lie! I won't fall for it! El won't fall for it!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed: 󠁿What a lie! I won't fall for it! El won't fall for it!

data.text:
That aside, with this you can debut without regret, 
right? The races should get more interesting! 
Passion! Fervor! I'm getting fired up!
data.name: El Condor Pasa
data.processed:
󠁿That aside, with this you can debut without regret, 
󠁿right? The races should get more interesting! 
󠁿Passion! Fervor! I'm getting fired up!

data.text:
Grass-chan, congratulations……! I'll be looking 
forward to the days we can compete together!
data.name: Special Week
data.processed:
󠁿Grass-chan, congratulations……! I'll be looking 
󠁿forward to the days we can compete together!

data.text:
Yes, I will too～. 
Fufufuu.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Yes, I will too～. 
󠁿Fufufuu.

data.text:
Grass Wonder responded to her rivals with a smile, 
then she came over here by herself.
data.processed:
󠁿Grass Wonder responded to her rivals with a smile, 
󠁿then she came over here by herself.

data.text: Thank you for coming, Trainer-san.
data.name: Grass Wonder

choices.text: Once again, I wanted to talk to you
Once again, I wanted to talk to you

data.processed: 󠁿Thank you for coming, Trainer-san.

data.text:
Fufu…… Yes. 
I've been waiting for you.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Fufu…… Yes. 
󠁿I've been waiting for you.

data.text:
Once again……my name is Grass Wonder. 
I look forward to your kind guidance.
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed:
󠁿Once again……my name is Grass Wonder. 
󠁿I look forward to your kind guidance.

data.text: Will you accompany me on this journey to the top?
data.name: Grass Wonder
data.processed: 󠁿Will you accompany me on this journey to the top?

data.text: And so, my days with the unyielding Grass Wonder began!
data.processed: 󠁿And so, my days with the unyielding Grass Wonder began!
